response.overview: Kaanbhatt is a tale of a young boy who follows his dream and desire, but destiny has some other plans for him for which he went on a different path. The story depicts the relationship between Ved and Science.
response.tagline: Kaanbhatt is a tale of a young boy who follows his dream and desire, but destiny has some other plans for him for which he went on a different path
response.title: Kaanbhatt
